attributes.action: Allow us to play tennis in lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
It’s a very safe sport outside with a natural barrier of a net
It’s great for physical and mental health
attributes.background: Allow outdoor  tennis courts to stay open for  singles play and for households to play together

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow indoor/outdoor tennis courts to operate under strict distancing protocols: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557428

Exempt outdoor tennis from closure due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557658
